Name: Cipher Key
AttributesDescription: An energy device crafted by the Court of Savantae. Can be used to disable the sealing device of Mianloong Chamber.
BgDescription: Those blessed by the deity aspired to raise a gate, however modest it may seem to the divine eyes. Even in its decay, the solitary gate stood sentinel: upholding reverence, for the divine is near.
ObtainedShowDescription: An energy device crafted by the Court of Savantae. Can be used to disable the sealing device of Mianloong Chamber.
